definitions.text: offensive or even (of persons) malicious; ; ; ; ; ; - Ezra Pound
examples: Will he say nasty things at my funeral?

definitions.text: exasperatingly difficult to handle or circumvent
examples: a good man to have on your side in a tight situation

definitions.text: disgustingly dirty; filled or smeared with offensive matter
examples: a nasty pigsty of a room
